name: Developer Persona Canvas
description:
The Developer Persona Canvas is an effective way to visualize a developerâ€™s needs on a single sheet of paper. It is primarily used by the DevRel team, but it can also be used by the marketing and product teams as well.


Personas are a way to personalize your target (i.e., put a name and face) to help you and your team think more personally about your users. Typically, three to four personas are created, although this may vary based on your product range.


Create one canvas for each persona.


The Developer Persona Canvas is designed by Caroline Lewko and James Parton for the book:

Developer Relations: How to Build and Grow a Successful Developer Program
